Package com.intellij.javadoc

Class JavadocHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.javadoc.JavadocHelper

  • public class JavadocHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is not singleton but provides single-point-of-usage field.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JavadocHelper.JavadocParameterInfo
      Encapsulates information about source code line that holds javadoc parameter.

      • navigate

        public void navigate(LogicalPosition position,
                     Editor editor,
                     Project project)
        Tries to navigate caret at the given editor to the target position inserting missing white spaces if necessary.
        Parameters:
        position - target caret position
        editor - target editor
        project - target project

      • calculateDescriptionStartPosition

        public LogicalPosition calculateDescriptionStartPosition(PsiFile psiFile,
                                                         java.util.Collection<? extends JavadocHelper.JavadocParameterInfo> data,
                                                         JavadocHelper.JavadocParameterInfo anchor)
        Calculates desired position of target javadoc parameter's description start.
        Parameters:
        psiFile - PSI holder
        data - parsed adjacent javadoc parameters
        anchor - descriptor for the target parameter
        Returns:
        logical position that points to the desired parameter description start location

      • parse

        public Pair<JavadocHelper.JavadocParameterInfo,java.util.List<JavadocHelper.JavadocParameterInfo>> parse(PsiFile psiFile,
                                                                                                         Editor editor,
                                                                                                         int offset)
        Returns information about all lines that contain javadoc parameters and are adjacent to the one that holds given offset.
        Parameters:
        psiFile - PSI holder for the document exposed the given editor
        editor - target editor
        offset - target offset that identifies anchor line to check
        Returns:
        pair like (javadoc info for the line identified by the given offset; list of javadoc parameter infos for adjacent lines if any
